attributes.action: ensure that every home has minimum space guideline and a garden
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it is the goverments obligation to ensure that everyone has sufficient space to live in and a garden, during the 50's the goverment ensured that all new council houses had sufficent space and a garden for the average working man,these were scoffed at but now are desirable property, now developers (including housing associations) are designing houses smaller and smaller putting maximum profit ahead of comfortable living, why would  people want compost kitchen waste if they dont have a garden to put it on and why would people care about a community if they are locked away in their little boxes ?
